Package org.apache.commons.io.output

Class ChunkedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • org.apache.commons.io.output.ChunkedOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class ChunkedOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
    OutputStream which breaks larger output blocks into chunks. Native code may need to copy the input array; if the write buffer is very large this can cause OOME.
    Since:
    2.5

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ChunkedOutputStream.Builder
      Builds a new UnsynchronizedByteArrayOutputStream instance.

public ChunkedOutputStream​(java.io.OutputStream stream)

        Creates a new stream that uses a chunk size of IOUtils.DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE.
        Parameters:

      • ChunkedOutputStream

        @Deprecated
public ChunkedOutputStream​(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                           int chunkSize)
        Deprecated.
        Use builder(), ChunkedOutputStream.Builder, and ChunkedOutputStream.Builder.get()
        Creates a new stream that uses the specified chunk size.
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to wrap
        chunkSize - the chunk size to use; must be a positive number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the chunk size is <= 0
